biotools.summary: For gene pattern discovery by enrichment analysis of their microRNA regulators is a web-accessible program, which is used to mine potential patterns for one single gene, multiple genes, and KEGG pathway genes based on miRNA set enrichment analysis of the miRNAs regulating given genes.

bioschemas.name: miR2Gene
bioschemas.summary: For gene pattern discovery by enrichment analysis of their microRNA regulators is a web-accessible program, which is used to mine potential patterns for one single gene, multiple genes, and KEGG pathway genes based on miRNA set enrichment analysis of the miRNAs regulating given genes.
